018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
022import static java.util.Objects.isNull;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.EMPTY_String_ARRAY;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVG.Usage.STANDALONE_DOCUMENT;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.cloneElement;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.closePath;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.createClipPath;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.createMarker;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.createPath;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.createSVG;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.lineTo;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.moveToAbs;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.number;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.vLineTo;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.type.SVGMarkerOrientation.AUTO;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLConnectorType.IMPLEMENTATION;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLConnectorType.INHERITANCE;
041
042import javax.lang.model.element.Name;
043import java.io.BufferedReader;
044import java.io.IOException;
045import java.io.InputStreamReader;
046import java.util.ArrayList;
047import java.util.Collection;
048import java.util.List;
049import java.util.Optional;
050
051import org.apiguardian.api.API;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.UmlGraphLinkTaglet;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVG;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGPath;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGRectangle;
057import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUse;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.type.SVGColor;
059
060/**
061 *  The container for a UML diagram.
062 *
063 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
064 *  @version $Id: UMLDocument.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
065 *  @since 0.0.5
066 */
067@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UMLDocument.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
068@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5")
069public class UMLDocument
070{
071        /*-----------*\
072    ====** Constants **========================================================
073        \*-----------*/
074    /**
075     *  The name of the CSS resource file: {@value}.
076     */
077    public static final String UML_CSS = "resources/uml.css";
078
079    /**
080     *  The colour 'black'.
081     */
082    public static final SVGColor SVG_COLOR_BLACK = new SVGColor( 0x00, 0x00, 0x00 );
083
084    /**
085     *  The colour 'white'.
086     */
087    public static final SVGColor SVG_COLOR_WHITE = new SVGColor( 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF );
088
089    /**
090     *  The spacing between UML graph elements: {@value} px.
091     */
092    public static final double SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING = 50.0;
093
094        /*------------*\
095    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
096        \*------------*/
097    /**
098     *  Width and height for this UML diagram.
099     */
100    @SuppressWarnings( {"unused", "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass", "FieldCanBeLocal"} )
101    private Dimension m_Dimension;
102
103    /**
104     *  The id counter.
105     *
106     *  @see #createId()
107     */
108    private int m_IdCounter = 0;
109
110    /**
111     *  The SVG that represents the diagram.
112     */
113    private final SVG m_Root;
114
115    /**
116     *  The SVG symbols representing the types.
117     */
118    private final Collection<TypeSymbol> m_TypeSymbols = new ArrayList<>();
119
120        /*------------------------*\
121    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
122        \*------------------------*/
123    /**
124     *  The CSS styles.
125     */
126    private static final String [] m_CSSStyles;
127
128    static
129    {
130        try
131        {
132            m_CSSStyles = loadCSS();
133        }
134        catch( final IOException e )
135        {
136            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
137        }
138    }
139
140        /*--------------*\
141    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
142        \*--------------*/
143    /**
144     *  Creates a new {@code UMLDocument} instance.
145     */
146    public UMLDocument()
147    {
148        m_Root = createSVG( STANDALONE_DOCUMENT );
149        m_Root.setStyleSheet( m_CSSStyles );
150
151        //---* Create the markers *--------------------------------------------
152        final var height = 40;
153        final var width = 40;
154        SVGPath path;
155
156        path = createPath( moveToAbs( width, height / 2 ), lineTo( -width, -height / 2 ), vLineTo( height ), closePath() );
157        path.setFill( SVG_COLOR_WHITE );
158        path.setStroke( SVG_COLOR_BLACK );
159        path.setStrokeWidth( number( 3 ) );
160        var marker = createMarker( INHERITANCE.getId(), m_Root );
161        marker.addChild( path );
162        marker.setViewBox( number( 0 ), number( 0 ), number( width ), number( height ) );
163        marker.setReferencePoint( number( width ), number( height / 2 ) );
164        marker.setMarkerUnits( false );
165        marker.setMarkerDimensions( number( 6 ), number( 6 ) );
166        marker.setOrientation( AUTO );
167
168        path = createPath( moveToAbs( width, height / 2 ), lineTo( -width, -height / 2 ), vLineTo( height ), closePath() );
169        path.setFill( SVG_COLOR_WHITE );
170        path.setStroke( SVG_COLOR_BLACK );
171        path.setStrokeWidth( number( 3 ) );
172        marker = createMarker( IMPLEMENTATION.getId(), m_Root );
173        marker.addChild( path );
174        marker.setViewBox( number( 0 ), number( 0 ), number( width ), number( height ) );
175        marker.setReferencePoint( number( width ), number( height / 2 ) );
176        marker.setMarkerUnits( false );
177        marker.setMarkerDimensions( number( 6 ), number( 6 ) );
178        marker.setOrientation( AUTO );
179    }   //  UMLDocument()
180
181        /*---------*\
182    ====** Methods **==========================================================
183        \*---------*/
184    /**
185     *  Creates an SVG {@code <clipPath>} element from the given rectangle and
186     *  adds it to the SVG root element for this UML document.
187     *
188     *  @param  clipRectangle   The rectangle that defines the clip path.
189     *  @return The id of the new SVG {@code <clipPath>} element.
190     */
191    public final String addClippath( final SVGRectangle clipRectangle )
192    {
193        requireNonNullArgument( clipRectangle, "clipRectangle" );
194
195        final var retValue = createId();
196        final var clippath = createClipPath( retValue, m_Root );
197        clippath.addChild( cloneElement( clipRectangle ) );
198
199        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
200        return retValue;
201    }   //  addClippath()
202
203    /**
204     *  Adds a UML connector for two type elements to this UML document.
205     *
206     *  @param  connector   The connector.
207     */
208    public final void addConnector( final UMLConnector connector )
209    {
210        m_Root.addChild( requireNonNullArgument( connector, "connector" ) );
211    }   //  addConnector()
212
213    /**
214     *  Adds the symbol for a type element to the UML document
215     *
216     *  @param  symbol  The symbol to add.
217     *  @return {@code true} if the symbol was added, {@code false} if not.
218     */
219    public final boolean addSymbol( final TypeSymbol symbol )
220    {
221        requireNonNullArgument( symbol, "symbol" );
222
223        final var retValue = m_TypeSymbols.stream()
224            .noneMatch( s -> s.equals( symbol ) );
225        if( retValue )
226        {
227            m_Root.addDefinition( symbol );
228            m_TypeSymbols.add( symbol );
229        }
230
231        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
232        return retValue;
233    }   //  addSymbol()
234
235    /**
236     *  Places a symbol in the output diagram.
237     *
238     *  @param  use The reference to the {@code <symbol>} element represent a
239     *      type.
240     */
241    public final void addUse( final SVGUse use )
242    {
243        m_Root.addChild( requireNonNullArgument( use, "use" ) );
244    }   //  addUse()
245
246    /**
247     *  Creates a new id that is unique inside the current UML document
248     *  instance.
249     *
250     *  @return The new id.
251     */
252    public final String createId()
253    {
254        final var retValue = format( "ID%06d", ++m_IdCounter );
255
256        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
257        return retValue;
258    }   //  createId()
259
260    /**
261     *  Returns the SVG root element for this UML document.
262     *
263     *  @return The SVG root element.
264     */
265    @SuppressWarnings( "unused" )
266    public final SVG getSVGRoot() { return m_Root; }
267
268    /**
269     *  Returns the symbol with for the type element with the given name from
270     *  this UML document.
271     *
272     *  @param  name    The name of the type element.
273     *  @return An instance of
274     *      {@link Optional}
275     *      that contains the symbol.
276     */
277    public final Optional<TypeSymbol> getSymbol( final Name name )
278    {
279        final var typeName = requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" ).toString();
280        final var retValue = m_TypeSymbols.stream()
281            .filter( s -> s.getTypeElement().getQualifiedName().toString().equals( typeName ) )
282            .findFirst();
283
284        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
285        return retValue;
286    }   //  getSymbol()
287
288    /**
289     *  Loads the CSS from the resources.
290     *
291     *  @return The CSS styles.
292     *  @throws IOException There is a problem on reading the resource with the
293     *      CSS.
294     */
295    private static final String [] loadCSS() throws IOException
296    {
297        final String [] styles;
298        final var cssResource = UmlGraphLinkTaglet.class.getResource( UML_CSS );
299        if( isNull( cssResource ) )
300        {
301            throw new IOException( format( "Cannot locate resource '%2$s' in package '%1$s'", UmlGraphLinkTaglet.class.getPackageName(), UML_CSS ) );
302        }
303        try( final var cssInputStream = cssResource.openStream();
304             final var cssReader = new BufferedReader( new InputStreamReader( cssInputStream, UTF_8 ) ) )
305        {
306            styles = cssReader.lines().toArray( String []::new );
307        }
308
309        final List<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
310        var isComment = false;
311        boolean endOfLine;
312        final var line = new StringBuilder();
313        int startPos, pos;
314        StripCommentLoop: for( final var s : styles )
315        {
316            endOfLine = false;
317            startPos = 0;
318            LineScanLoop: while( !endOfLine )
319            {
320                if( isComment )
321                {
322                    pos = s.indexOf( "*/", startPos );
323                    if( pos < 0 )
324                    {
325                        endOfLine = true;
326                    }
327                    else
328                    {
329                        isComment = false;
330                        startPos = pos + 2;
331                    }
332                }
333                else
334                {
335                    if( !line.isEmpty() ) line.append( ' ' );
336                    pos = s.indexOf( "/*", startPos );
337                    if( pos < 0 )
338                    {
339                        line.append( s.substring( startPos ) );
340                        endOfLine = true;
341                    }
342                    else
343                    {
344                        if( pos > startPos )
345                        {
346                            line.append( s, startPos, pos );
347                        }
348                        isComment = true;
349                        startPos = pos + 2;
350                    }
351                }
352            }   //  LineScanLoop:
353
354            if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( line ) ) retValue.add( line.toString() );
355            line.setLength( 0 );
356        }   //  StripCommentLoop:
357
358        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
359        return retValue.toArray( EMPTY_String_ARRAY );
360    }   //  loadCSS()
361
362    /**
363     *  Sets the width and height for the UML diagram.
364     *
365     *  @param  width   The width.
366     *  @param  height  The height.
367     */
368    public final void setDimension( final double width, final double height )
369    {
370        m_Dimension = new Dimension( width, height );
371        m_Root.setDimension( number( width ), number( height ) );
372    }   //  setDimensions()
373
374    /**
375     *  {@inheritDoc}
376     */
377    @Override
378    public final String toString() { return m_Root.toString(); }
379}
380//  class UMLDocument
381
382/*
383 *  End of File
384 */
